audioformats: Dolby Digital 2ch Stereo, Dolby Digital Stereo Creator; MPEG-4 AAC-LC 2ch
memorycardtype: Internal Flash Memory; Memory Stick Micro (Mark 2); Micro SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Card(Class 4 or Higher)
imagestablizer: Yes, Optical SteadyShot Image Stabilization with Intelligent Active mode (Wide to Tele)

shootingmodes: Intelligent Auto (Portrait, Baby, Walk, Tripod, Backlight, Landscape, Spotlight, Twilight, Macro, Low light), Scene Selection (Auto, Night Scene, Sunrise & Sunset, Fireworks, Landscape, Portrait, Spotlight, Beach, Snow)
